data.text: @schmangee I was saying this in May 2020. CDC knew early on Covid risk was older adults & overweight people. Two years of masking & isolating healthy young people will be felt for decades to come.
@schmangee Wow.  People over 85 drive 10 times worse than 5 year olds.

@schmangee Would love to see this updated for places like NYC where maybe 90% of the population has had Covid and 95% of adults have had at least one dose of vaccine.  In general, we need ways for people to understand how tiny Covid risks are now for anyone vaxxed or Covid-recovered.

@schmangee Another thing, can we use these and similar charts to make aggressive efforts towards driving child traffic deaths?  Instead of negative effects of closures, we might actually get positive effects of active lifestyles?

@schmangee Interesting chart, I think to get what closures did to drive the COVID deaths in children one might want to look at the same charts but for  states with different COVID policies but the same overall traffic fatalities rate.
@schmangee Still low. Shouldn’t land transport deaths total to about 40k?
@neipate96 It's more than a year old
